items.title: Edge Limited
items.short-descriptions: We know the importance of having a new car and being rest assured that it stays in tip-top condition.
model-specifications: 2.5L Duratec® I-4 engine (includes Active Grille Shutters)
6-speed automatic transmission
Mid-level audio with multifunction display, 6 speakers and Ford SYNC®
Self-colored upper and lower grilles with upper chrome bar
6-way manual driver’s seat
